page.title: Savings Account
page.tab:
There are times when you need things that go back to basic. Our Savings account is designed for customers who want a hassle free savings account that satisfies basic banking needs.

Key Features and benefits:

  • Two currencies are available in USD and KHR.
  • Interest is calculated daily
  • Convenient access to your account through our branch network.
  • Free withdrawal once a month
  • Passbook is provided at the time of account opening

Eligibility:

  • Customer need to be 18 years old or above
  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 100
  • Minimum balance requirement is USD 10
  • This account is available to individual, or joint account holders.

Document requirements for account opening:

  • Primary document:
    • Cambodia National Identification Card; or
    • Passport
  • Any two of the below secondary documents in case the primary document is not available:
    • Birth certificate
    • Resident book
    • Marriage certificate
    • Residential Certificate by an official authority
    • Family book with photo of head of family
    • Driving license issued by an official authority
